mapper.select: select bc.id, bc.company_name, bc.company_url, bc.company_domain_name from base_brand bb left join base_company bc on bb.company_id = bc.id where bb.id = #{brandId} and bb.is_deleted = 0
select id AS id, app_id AS appId, app_name AS appName, dashboard_config AS config from miniprogram_dashboard_config where is_deleted= 0 AND app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t1.id AS id ,t2.id AS picId ,t2.pic_path as picPath ,t1.company_introduce AS introduce ,t1.introduce_title as introduceTitle from base_company t1 left join res_pic t2 on t2.id = t1.company_pic_id where t1.id = #{companyId}

select id AS id, business_id AS businessId, business_type AS businessType, rich_context AS richContext from common_rich_context_store where is_deleted = 0 and business_id = #{businessId} and business_type = #{businessType}
select id AS id, app_id AS appId, company_id AS companyId from base_company_mini_program_config where is_deleted = 0 and app_id = #{appId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

select id AS id, act_name AS act_name, act_rule AS act_rule, share_img AS share_img, begain_time AS begain_time, end_time AS end_time, product_name AS product_name, product_original_price AS product_original_price, product_discount_price AS product_discount_price, product_min_price AS product_min_price, product_img AS product_img, product_count AS product_count, registration_count AS registration_count, app_id AS appId from wx_act_bargain where is_deleted = 0 and is_enable = 1
AND product_remain_count > 0 AND end_time >= now()
and app_id = #{appId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ORDER BY gmt_create DESC

SELECT bgsp.id AS spuId, min(bgsk.price) AS price from base_goods_spu bgsp LEFT JOIN base_goods_sku bgsk on bgsp.id = bgsk.spu_id where bgsp.is_deleted = 0
AND bgsp.id in
#{item,jdbcType=INTEGER}
GROUP BY bgsk.spu_id
